Firstly, we create the object and the re: Firstly, we create the object and the resolve function.
Then we load the database API.
Y al final definimos las funciones de in: And in the end we define the start and close functions, and we return the object of the API.
El API Loader es la función que se encar:
The Loader API is the function that is responsible for mounting the entire API,
that in the end is an object that is accessible, normally,
or as `this` in the methods of the framework itself,
or as a parameter.
.
Se dice que la API siempre está accesibl: It is said that the API is always accessible because, in general, this project adopts patterns or ideas of functional programming. And try, although not strictly, that all variables used in the function are provided via `this` or via parameters is a clause in my programming style.
los módulos deben estar en orden de carg: modules must be in order of load, otherwise implement your own strategy or wrap it up as 1 group.
